name: Mandolin0
tagline: A web form bruteforce tool based on templating
body:
### Introduction
Mandolin0 is a web form bruteforcing tool created with the aims to be very performant and easy to use. It is based on the concept of Template and Oracle, this will help not experienced auditors to use the tool without the knowledge of how to setup a login HTTP Post (this of course isn't an excuse to not learn hot the things work).

### Download
You can download a compiled version of Mandolin0 from [here](https://github.com/enkomio/Mandolin0/releases/tag/v1.0.0).

### Demo
Mandolin0 include templates for the most common CMS. If you want to test a Wordpress web site just use the following command:

```
Mandolin0 -w http://wordpress.web.site --template Wordpress
```

### Documentation
* [user's manual](https://github.com/enkomio/Mandolin0/wiki)
